com.mrdimka.hammercore.api.multipart

Class BlockMultipartProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
        • com.mrdimka.hammercore.api.multipart.BlockMultipartProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMultipartProvider, net.minecraftforge.fml.common.registry.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>

    public abstract class BlockMultipartProvider
extends net.minecraft.block.Block
implements IMultipartProvider
    Baseline block that supports multipart. Use ModBlocks.registerBlock(Block, String) to register it.
    Optional interfaces: INoItemBlock (why do you need that?)
